column4: Umm... I can't get my microphone to work properly. Can someone help me?
Can someone help me with my microphone problems?
I'm trying to record from it, have tried everything I can, but the audio won't record.
what is the output of: wget -O alsa-info.sh http://www.alsa-project.org/alsa-info.sh; chmod +x ./alsa-info.sh; ./alsa-info.sh
ok run: gedit /tmp/alsa-info.txt.XWZk3hzpog    pastebin the text please
try adding: options snd-hda-intel model=asus position_fix=1 enable_msi=1   to /etc/modprobe.d/alsa-base.conf    but BEFORE that, boot to the STABLE kernel. Does it work there?
Stable kernel causes kernel panic D:
it is legal, ultimate gamer edition is a rehashed ubuntu with lots of free games on
Oh, my bad. I saw torrents and thought that immediately.
http://ultimateedition.info/ultimate-edition/ultimate-edition-gamers/   list of games which come pre-installed there
